Text: thanks for xvid not everyone likes the mkv files ( they take triple time to doenload then have to be converted to xvid to be able to watch)

Thanks. No problem with any file format...including mkv. MKV plays fine using VLC player. MKV does not take longer to download...350 MB is 350 MB regardless of file format. MKV does not require converting if you use an appropriate play, such as the worlds most common and popular player, VLC.
